name: Bitwarden
description: Open-source password vault with end-to-end encryption and cross-device sync.

name: KeePass
description: Offline password manager that stores encrypted credentials locally.

name: LastPass
description: Cloud-based password storage with autofill and multi-device access.

name: NordPass
description: Modern password manager with zero-knowledge encryption architecture.

name: KeePassXC
description: Cross-platform open-source fork of KeePass with browser integration.

name: 1Password
description: Password manager with secure vaults and device syncing.

name: Dashlane
description: Password storage with breach monitoring and autofill features.

name: RoboForm
description: Password manager with form-filling and encryption support.

name: Enpass
description: Offline-first password manager with cloud sync options.

name: Zoho Vault
description: Team-based password manager with role access controls.

name: Passbolt
description: Open-source password manager for teams and enterprises.

name: Padloc
description: Zero-knowledge password manager with multi-device sync.

name: LessPass
description: Stateless password generator that never stores your secrets.

name: TeamPassword
description: Shared password management platform for teams.

name: RememBear
description: Beginner-friendly password manager with strong encryption.

name: Keeper
description: Enterprise-grade password vault with zero-trust security.

name: SafeInCloud
description: Encrypted password manager with cross-platform syncing.

name: True Key
description: Password manager with biometric login support.

name: Psono
description: Open-source password manager for self-hosted environments.

name: Vaultwarden
description: Lightweight self-hosted Bitwarden-compatible server.
